entry.title: Wednesday night: Periods of light snow. Low minus 22.
entry.summary: Periods of light snow ending after midnight then cloudy. Wind north 30 km/h becoming light early this evening. Low minus 22. Wind chill near minus 29. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Wednesday 01 February 2023

entry.title: Thursday: Mainly cloudy. High minus 18.
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. Wind becoming southeast 20 km/h gusting to 40 in the morning. High minus 18. Wind chill near minus 32. Risk of frostbite. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Wednesday 01 February 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: Partly cloudy. Temperature rising to minus 12 by morning.
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. Wind southeast 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light in the evening. Temperature rising to minus 12 by morning. Wind chill minus 28 in the evening and minus 23 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Wednesday 01 February 2023
